_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Ten things to be developed for insight i: The perception of the repulsiveness of food
The perception of dissatisfaction with the whole world
The perception of a worm-infested corpse
The perception of a livid corpse
The perception of a split open corpse
The perception of a bloated corpse
